name: NEXCOVER 55 Inch Grill Cover - 600D Heavy Duty Waterproof and Weather Resistant BBQ Cover for Weber, Char Broil, Nexgrill - Fade Resistant, Black
short_description: 【Wide Compatibility】: The upgraded grill cover measures 55"(W) by 23"(D) by 42"(H). Not designed to cover the wheels entirely, the grill could be moved freely with cover on. Please kindly measure your grill before ordering. 【Upgraded Material】: The NEXCOVER Grill Cover is made of heavy duty Oxford fabric with waterproof PVC coating that can last through all seasons. Made from 600D polyester canvas, the bbq cover is waterproof, UV-resistant, and tear-proof, providing long-lasting protection against harsh weather conditions and preventing fading for a like-new look. 【Handles & Straps & Covered Air Vents】: The upgraded grill cover is designed with concealed air vent, 2 handles and adjustable 2 straps. Concealed air vent design can keep your grill dry well. Handles and straps is convenient to hold the grill and grill cover tightly together - Prevent your cover from blowing off. 【Easy to Use & Clean】: This upgraded grill cover is lightweight, sturdy, and super easy to fold up for storage. Cleaning is a breeze, too—just rinse with water, and the dirt washes right off. Pro tip: Make sure your grill is cool before covering it up. 【Reliable Customer Service】: We always proudly stand behind the quality of all our products. Your satisfaction is TOP important. Should you have any questions about the product or after-sale service, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here for support and advice!

name: OutdoorLines Waterproof Heavy Duty BBQ Grill Cover - Universal Barbecue Grill Covers UV Resistant Barbeque Gas Grill Cover for Outdoor Universal Grills, 58L x 24W x 44H Inch, Black
short_description: Package Contents: Each package includes 1 black grill cover measured 58L x 24W x 44H inches with high compatibility to fit most brands of grills in the current market. Waterproof, UV-Resistant & Durable Oxford Fabric BBQ Grill Cover: Made of 420D high density Oxford fabric with special and advanced technology, these 100% waterproof gas grill covers can withstand the maximum water pressure of 3000 PA which will help your expansive property keep clean and dry. Also coated with a UV resistant layer, our barbecue grill covers stand strong under high sun exposure, rainstorm, snowstorm and other extreme weather, providing all-year round protection to those grills. Windproof Heavy Duty Barbecue Grill Cover With Velcro Straps & Padded Handles: Featuring 2 adjustable velcro straps at each side (4 straps in total), OutdoorLines barbecue grill cover aims to keep it secure fit for your barbecue grills. It is also equipped with reinforced padded handles at 2 sides for you to put on and take off much easier. 2 Sizes & 3 Colors Available, Perfect for Most Grills: 2 universal sizes (58" L x 24" W x 44" H, 64" L x 24" W x 44" H) with black, gray and camel colors are designed to best match your needs and offer a classical and elegant look while protecting your bbq grills. Easy to Care: Wipe it clean with a wet towel or wash it with cold water by hand. Tumble Dry At Low Heat. DO NOT bleach. Low Temperature Iron. (Tips: Do not use it until your grill is completely cold down)

name: Grill Cover, 58 inch BBQ Gas Grill Cover for Outdoor Grill, Waterproof, Anti-UV, Rip-Proof, Fade Resistant Material, Barbecue Cover with Hook-and-Loop Straps & Adjustable Hem Drawstring, Black
short_description: [Waterproof & Weather Resistance]: Made of polyester waterproof material, it has the function of waterproof in rain and dustproof and anti-UV in sunny day. If your grill width is slightly wider than 58 inches (within 60''), it's okay as long as the width plus depth is less than or equal to 82 inches. The choice of grill cover depends on the size of your grill, please make sure to measure your grill before purchasing. Do not clean in the washing machine and dryer. Please use the cover after the grill has cooled down and keep away from fire. Please be careful of the sharp edges of the grill to prevent damage to the grill cover [Use with Confidence] We provide multiple sizes of covers for grills of different sizes. GRILL COVER DIMENSIONS - 58''L x 24''W x 48''H
